Suit¶

Note

Suit inherets from the python enum.Enum() class.

class vox_cards.card.Suit¶

An Enumeration to make handling card suits easier.

Parameters

suit – A number between 0 and 4 denoting the suit, they are diamonds, clubs, hearts, spades, and joker respectively.

Returns

Returns an enum representing the suit. str(Suit) returns the titlecase representation of the suit name.

Return type

enum.Enum
